summary:
Yandex is a Russian tech company offering various online services, including Russia's top search engine, Yandex Search. It was founded in 1997 and became the largest tech company in Russia by 2017. Yandex operates in many countries, mainly serving Russian-speaking populations. It has over 30 global offices and competes with Google and Microsoft.

The company's holding entity, Yandex N.V., was based in Amsterdam and listed on the Nasdaq and Moscow Exchange. In 2024, Yandex sold most of its assets to Russian investors, increasing Kremlin control. The company now trades on the Moscow Exchange as YDEX.
title: Yandex
